open_questions.question: Is 41% agent context reduction sufficient?
open_questions.note: Carlos compressed independently; awaiting Conductor confirmation

answered_questions.question: MCP tool registration format for agent personas
answered_questions.decision: Register each persona as separate agent via conductor_request_access(). agentId: carlos-{persona}, agentType: custom, capabilities[]: persona-specific, metadata: {persona, modelTier, contextBudget}, instructionsFile: persona .md path. No Conductor changes needed — existing agent registration API is sufficient.

answered_questions.question: Model routing ownership
answered_questions.decision: Carlos owns model_router.py as canonical implementation (TaskType × Complexity → ModelTier). Conductor consumes routing decisions via agent metadata.modelTier field — no duplication of routing logic. Carlos maintains routing tables; Conductor applies them during agent-task matching.
